name: Before Midnight
description:
An entry for #bitsyjam January 2018 ("Midnight"). Significantly more complicated than my previous project. Music may come at some point in the future, but it wasn't working out.

Use arrow keys to navigate.

Created with Bitsy by Adam Le Doux.

Invaluable help from OpenGameArt.org

Title card font is ModeSeven by Andrew Bulhak, freeware for personal and commercial use.
